name: My Jollof Brings all the Boys to the Yard Purple  T-shirt
description:
My Jollof Brings all the Boys to the Yard - Damn right its better than yours. This tee pays homage to one of Africas favourite food jollof Rice. 
We took the famous lyrics of the Kelis milksahke song and made it African.

name: Girls Abre
description:
Girls are tired. Poplar Ghanaian saying.
What are you girls tired off?

name: Boys Abre tshirt
description:
Boys Abre - Boys are tired. Popular saying from a Ghanaian song Akayida by Guru - Watch it here http://youtu.be/YdMAn91wYWU

Boys - What are you tired of?

name: Kayobi Kente Signature T-shirt ladies
description: This tee is inspired by the complex kente cloth from Bonwire in the Ashanti region of Ghana and features the new Kayobi Signature. A mixture of class and culture.

name: Kayobi Kente Signature T-shirt
description: This tee is inspired by the complex kente cloth from Bonwire in the Ashanti region of Ghana and features the new Kayobi Signature. A mixture of class and culture.

name: True Revolutionary - Nelson Mandela  Womens T-Shirt
description:
We believe the standard of African leadership today leaves much to be desired and hence we have created an African Heroes collection to remind everyone what true heroes look like. We decided to cover the eyes of the heroes and replace in with inspiring words as a nod to pop art and most importantly as a reverse critique of some of Africa's current leadership who lead blindly.

In our first shirt of the collection we pay homage to possibly Africa's biggest hero and revolutionary Nelson Rolihlahla Mandela.

Rest in Peace Madiba

name: True Revolutionary - Nelson Mandela T-shirt
description:
We believe the standard of African leadership today leaves much to be desired and hence we have created an African Heroes collection to remind everyone what true heroes look like. We decided to cover the eyes of the heroes and replace in with inspiring words as a nod to pop art and most importantly as a reverse critique of some of Africa's current leadership who lead blindly.

In our first shirt of the collection we pay homage to possibly Africa's biggest hero and revolutionary Nelson Rolihlahla Mandela.

Rest in Peace Madiba

name: True Visionary - Kwame Nkrumah T-Shirt
description:
We believe the standard of African leadership today leaves much to be desired and hence we have created an African Heroes collection to remind everyone what true heroes look like. We decided to cover the eyes of the heroes and replace in with inspiring words as a nod to pop art and most importantly as a reverse critique of some of Africa's current leadership who lead blindly.

In our first shirt of the collection we pay homage to Pan - Africanist Visionary Kwame Nkrumah.

Kwame Nkrumah was the leader of Ghana and its predecessor state, the Gold Coast, from 1951 to 1966. Overseeing the nation's independence from British colonial rule in 1957, Nkrumah was the first President of Ghana and the first Prime Minister of Ghana. An influential 20th-century advocate of Pan-Africanism, he was a founding member of the Organization of African Unity

Kwame Nkrumah was the leader of Ghana and its predecessor state, the Gold Coast, from 1951 to 1966. Overseeing the nation's independence from British colonial rule in 1957, Nkrumah was the first President of Ghana and the first Prime Minister of Ghana. name: Make Fufu not War T - Shirt
description:
This is everyones favorite. The inspiration for this T Shirt came from the classic line Make Love Not War. We simply flipped the concept and Africanized it.
Fufu: Is a staple food of West and Central Africa. It is usually made from cassava, yams, and sometimes combined with cocoyam, plantains, or maize that is pounded and eaten with your delicious soup of choice.
Hmmmm Enjoy


Convert price to dollars here: http://www.dollars2pounds.com/

name: Make Fufu Not War Unisex Jumper
description:
Back by popular demand and just in time to keep you warm we have brought back our classic make fufu not war jumpers. 

Only 5 of each size will be printed.
ie. Small - 38", Medium - 40", Large - 42", XLarge - 44", 2XLarge - 46"

These jumpers will not be reprinted once this batch sells out.

name: Oh Chale  Red  (Womens)
description:
A VERY popular Ghanaian (Pidgin English) expression used in multiple senses in the same sense as the words "Dude" or "Homie." Used with "Oh" as an expression of disappointment, pity, and sympathy.

This design employs the classic Yo MTV Raps design and gives it a funky Ghanaian twist.

Please note: shirt cut in the second image is for display purposes only. Actual shirt is a fitted ladies shirt similar to our other shirts. 

WOMEN'S CLASSIC FITTED T-SHIRT Guide
S (8-10), M(10-12), L(12-14), XL (14-16)

If your size is sold out please send as an email and we will print one just for you.

name: For the Love of Africa (Womens)
description:
This T-shirt was created for all the lovers of Africa and truly expresses why we design and why we hope to rebrand Africa one t-shirt at a time.

If you love this continent rich with beauty and courage, then this shirt is for you.
